replies.body: {{item:3031}} + Conquerer + {{champion:23}}
I cannot wait to try this.
Why? Does Trynd ship with crit as one of his base stats? Coz last I checked 2x0, still 0

Yeah, his passive can give him 35% crit chance. So double that = 70%. And the true damage plus conquerer means 40% of his crits will be true damage. So he should be able to destroy people who build tabis and randuins omen as well as the usual squishies.
I feel like you have no idea what his passive does.
Well rip me,i main gangplank. {{item:3031}} {{item:3036}} {{item:1018}} its fine tho, ill just have to build a pd or statiik before IE
I hope you realise the meta GP build for the last 5 months has been {{item:3078}} {{item:3053}} {{item:3142}}
but the meta build is boring tho :( screw steraks i like crit plank
I believe GP gonna be stronger in the late game, he is not an early snowball champ anyway, thus the new IE gonna make him stronger and has to play safe before he is getting stronger.
i feel like i may want to try an {{item:3508}} for {{champion:131}} now
She has the little mana regen attack anyways so she should be really good with sustaining mana with ER in mid lane. Would be pretty sick to see
her ult also brings you within auto attack range so the second passive on ER would be great as well
{{item:3031}}  wait wtf how does ie interact with yasuo passive now
i don't know, if u buy pd then i.e. it might give 100 straight away. if they don't i think they have to rework his passive.
Akali Main, i don't get affected. Oh wait rework is coming, yay!

It's rather funny how, in this "ADC patch", the AD assassins and brawlers are the ones who really benefit.

As per the usual, Riot looks at an issue, then changes everything but the the cause.
uhhhhhhh {{item:3508}} on vaynne? gonna be broken just ult, get the huge attack speed, plus when you auto get cd taken off q.
{{champion:96}}
R.I.P im a yasuo main {{item:3031}} nerfed gives no crit i have no clue what im gonna build

Doesnt it just balance out though? Assuming Zeal is still 20 crit IE would make you 40 + passive anyways. Zeal items costs more but IE build path is 2 1300 items instead of a 1300 + 1675 or whatever with more AD. Oh and Yas loves Bork/Thirster so theres that, they might fuck with the build path to make them cheaper though.
Im a noob and have no idea how conquerer would interact with IE though so it might make it suck but they do similar things anyways so you can just take Press anyways.

Im pretty sure Conqueror plus IE true damage will be balanced since the IE true damage is only on Critical strikes. Obviously gonna be crazy with 100% crit (Like Yasuo) but since the zeal items are more expensive it makes it pretty balanced.
hey he gets true damage now though

can't you still just build pd+ie for 100% crit chance? pd gives 30%, ie passive doubles to 60%, yasuo passive doubles to 120% or just 100%. the crit turning into true damage essentially means you'll be doing more damage with crits, especially against people who build armour. if anything, it will stay pretty much the same.

Yasuo still gets 100% crit chance with PD (or any zeal upgrade) and IE
watch redmercys vid on it and with conquerors you get a bunch of true damage , i actually think yasuo is stronger now.

I thought the change to LDR was silly. But then thinking, if someone ran Conqueror AND the new IE, that's a WHOLE lot of true damage. Especially Yasuo. So Having all of that True damage + Giant slayer from LDR would be legit Broken against tanks. Really happy with this Patch. Cannot wait :)

ADC in 2018 lul
Lmao. ADC are having a bunch of Armour removed early now, Assassins will be super fun to play
RIP Yasuo Patch 8.11 </3

Are you kidding? Not only does he still get 100% crit at PD+IE, If you run conqueror, legit half of your insane damage will be TRUE damage. Only issue with Yasuo now is the added cost of zeal items. Other than that, its a buff to him if anything.
took em' long enough

So what items still have crit chance now? Plus adding Jhin's abilities to an item seems unimaginative and makes him less unique if everyone can have a guaranteed crit on an auto and the movement speed from the crits..
Looks like I'll be sticking to support if I can't play my full crit Jhin anymore. Riot always making things "fun"
IE has had its bonus crit damage taken away and added true damage, and ER has had the crit chance taken away, but added Mana regen on auto attacks. the zeal items are just more expensive.
So {{item:3508}}  on {{champion:96}} Means permanent W
Can i get an attack speed and AP item that builds out of zeal please?
